description: From the northern fire tribe, Atlas was born from the ashes of his fallen father in combat. He is fearless and does not fear battle.
name: atlas

description: Bahamethut is an immortal dragon. Cruel and ruthless, he comes from the undead realm and is a judge among his dragon tribe.
name: bahamethut

description: Frealu has an ice breath that can freeze her enemies into a paralyzed state. She is from the souther water tribe.
name: frealu

description: Pradumo is a sage from the easter woods. She practices healing medicine.
name: pradumo

description: Tagnaurak's breathe melts and refines precious gems. He covets money and loves shiny things that he obsessively collects.
name: tagnaurak

description: Midnight has a stealth attack mode. He can disappear and ghost for sneak attacks.
name: midnight

description: Longlu is a healer in the water tribe. She heals warriors who have known battle.
name: longlu

description: Dexler is a protector of the earth and forests. He is as green as the earth and burrows into the ground for protection and extra defense.
name: dexler

description: Fireball is a young dragon in training. He is learning how to control his fire, but is still lethal.
name: fireball

description: Shadow is one of the stealthiest dragons. He can disappear and is known to assassinate many of his enemies.
name: shadow

description: Herma is a wise water sage dragon. Dragons travel from all the land to seek her counsel and her wisdom.
name: herma

description: Samurilio wears protective armor that gives him a defense boost in battle. He holds honor for his earth tribe.
name: samurilio

description: Firestorm can summon a fire storm of hail and rain, that burns his opponents.
name: firestorm

description: Sonic has black spikes that can penetrate his enemies. He has a spiked tail that can attack his opponents.
name: sonic

description: Hydrasha is a double headed dragon. She wields both ice and water.
name: hydraysha

description: Cassidiuma is the personal protector and knight of the dragon queen Methryl. She is the queen's most loved and feared warrior.
name: cassidiuma

description: Isilier is one of the noblest dragon generals in the fire army. His fire attack is one of the strongest in the fleet.
name: isilier

description: Sheblonguh breathes a dark mucus that blinds his enemies permanently and causes paralysis.
name: sheblonguh

description: Frost can create an eternal winter. He is from the ice tribe of Lanzu.
name: frost

description: Ragnorl is a rogue dragon, disowned from his own tribe. He can change colors to blend with the earth around him.
name: ragnorl

description: Eislex flies with the fire sprites. He protects them and is their guardian.
name: eislex

description: Smolder is a dragon that's bred strictly for battle. Ferocious and fearless, this dragon has an aggressive attack.
name: smolder

description: Protheus is a wise and ancient dragon that serves on the grand council in the sky world. He uses his power to calm those near him.
name: protheus

description: Shulmi is the fastest dragon that can escape any battle. She can outmaneuver most enemies.
name: shulmi

description: Xanya is the fire tribe's banished general. She broke ranks and has been wandering ever since.
name: xanya

description: Belonging to no tribe, Magnum is a wanderer who finds his own path and can be your best friend, or worst enemy.
name: magnum

description: Yuxo is a Dragon of the ocean. She breathes underwater and protects oceania.
name: yuxo

description: Castral lives in the mighty mountain. He has built an underground of tunnels from which he terrorizes.
name: castral

description: Languatha is a noble fire dragon and direct heir to the fire tribe's throne. She is cunning and wise, but has a venomous bite.
name: languatha

description: Mino is a dwarf dragon. He's small but fast and can fly undetected by his enemies.
name: mino

description: Sukola is protector of the skies. She stands as sentinel to the sky world and is full of valor and strength.
name: sukola

description: Jerichombur is a dragon of mischief. His earth crushing roar can be heard for miles.
name: jerichombur

description: Omnitrek is a fire dragon that uses his fire breathe to hypnotize his opponents. He is from the fire tribe.
name: omnitrek

description: Lucian is a trickster. His deadly smoke attack confuses and berserks his enemies into a panicked frenzy.
name: lucian

description: Sprinkles is a celebrity dragon. He travels as a bard telling tales and songs of heroic feats.
name: sprinkles

description: Prythus is a warlock dragon. He casts spells and can summon creatures to help in fight in battle.
name: prythus

description: Crimson is a soldier in the dragon fire army. He breathes fire lightning for a multiple attack.
name: crimson

description: Nightingale uses her song to lull and seduce her opponents. She is deadly.
name: nightingale

description: Restula is one of the rarest dragons. She has only been seen once every millennia but is said to bless the planet with her tears.
name: restula

description: Amaron is a peacekeeper dragon and defender of all living things. He is from the mythical forests of Jeaunord that are deeply rooted with magic.
name: amaron

description: Ruby has a skin and coat that's as hard as gems. This gives her extra defense against her enemies.
name: ruby

description: Tornado has a fierce wind attack that traps his opponents in cyclones. His wings are larger than most dragons.
name: tornado

description: Galadi is an ancient and rare dragon from the original dragon fathers. He lives in the sky kingdom and serves on the grand counsel.
name: galadi

description: Warcumer is part of the earth tribe and has a deadly ground attack. Wide and stout, the dragon fights best on the ground.
name: warcumer

description: Norslo breathes lava instead of fire. He creates magna flows and traps his enemies.
name: norslo

description: Blackhole is dragon demon. He can breathe a black hole that sucks his enemies into the void of everlasting darkness.
name: blackhole

description: Treklor is a Dragon God. He is the mightiest of the grand council of dragons.
name: treklor

description: Havarth was born from the center of his planet, Grindru. The earth and mountains obey his call.
name: havarth
